name: Because We're Here ~Mohnblume und Blauerose~ Act I
description: Stagger through the First Lassallian War and find love amongst doomed youth. 'Because We're Here' is a plot-driven otome visual novel in an unforgiving WW1-inspired setting. Don't worry - it'll all be over by Christmas.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 1Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card Storage: 400 MB available space
